alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe; Torrance (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 2:00PM MDT until June 01 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... Northeastern Torrance County in central New Mexico... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 159 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles north of Encino, or 22 miles northwest of Vaughn, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milagro. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 241 and 245 and state highway 3 between Encino and Interstate 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
